effect.short: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

flavorTexts.text:

more easily. This may also leave the target with
a burn.
